title: VolunteerLink
description: VolunteerLink is an online platform designed to connect volunteers with organizations efficiently. It aims to bridge the gap between eager volunteers and organizations in need of their skills.

title: IE Network Solutions LMS
description: I build the frontend part of a Learning Management System for IE Network Solutions, during my internship there.

title: iconic-duos
description: A data analysis on TMDB movie data to find out which actors tend to appear together in movies.

title: Amharic Sentiment Analysis
description: Done for Machine Learning course semester project. This is an attempt made to create a machine learning model to detect sentiment in Amharic texts. Twitter (now X) comment data was used to train the models.
